name: A Knight's Maze
description:
A Knight's Maze is an entry for the  'Syntax Bomb' aMAZEing competition.

Developed in Godot (my first time using Godot), it is way from finished and is a prototype.

You are the Knight and you are stuck in the Maze!

Find the door to go deeper into the Maze!

Controls:

Cursor Keys/D-Pad: Move

Space/Button A: Attack

Enter/Start: Play (on Menu)

Select/Space; Toggle full screen (on Menu)
